statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.EmployeeNo , AA.EmployeeType , AA.Email , AA.PhoneNo , AA.MobileNo , AA.FaxNo , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
, DD.Name as DepartmentName , BB.Position
FROM dbo.TEmployee AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TAppointment BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.EmployeeID AND BB.StartDate <= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112), 112) AND ISNULL(BB.EndDate, CONVERT(DATETIME, '29991231', 112)) >= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112), 112) LEFT JOIN dbo.TDepartment DD WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.DepartmentID = DD.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.EmployeeNo LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND BB.DepartmentID = #DepartmentID#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TEmployee AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TEmployee ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, EmployeeNo, EmployeeType, Email, PhoneNo, MobileNo, FaxNo, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #EmployeeNo#, #EmployeeType#, #Email#, #PhoneNo#, #MobileNo#, #FaxNo#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TEmployee SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , EmployeeNo = #EmployeeNo# , EmployeeType = #EmployeeType# , Email = #Email# , PhoneNo = #PhoneNo# , MobileNo = #MobileNo# , FaxNo = #FaxNo# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
